title: Firefox 47.0a2 Aurora

notes.note: Embedded YouTube videos now play with HTML5 video if Flash is not installed.
Allow no-cache on back/forward navigations for https resources
FUEL (Firefox User Extension Library) has been removed. Add-ons relying on it will stop working.
WebCrypto: PBKDF2 supports SHA-2 hash algorithms

[cuechange events][1] are now available on TextTrack objects


  [1]: https://html.spec.whatwg.org/multipage/embedded-content.html#event-media-cuechange

[Implemented Document.scrollingElement][1] to tell which element's scroll attributes reflect the viewport scroll state


  [1]: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Document/scrollingElement
See Firefox run! Review Firefox performance data in about:performance.
Smart multi-line input in the Web Console
Custom user agents supported in Responsive Design Mode
Simulate Push messages in the  Service Workers developer tool
View, start,and debug registered Service Workers in the Service Workers developer tool
'Start' button for service workers in about:debugging to start registered Service Workers

Tilt is available as extension on [AMO][1]


  [1]: https://addons.mozilla.org/firefox/addon/tilt/

text: For more information about Developer Edition please see this MDN article.
system_requirements:
## Windows

### Operating Systems (32-bit and 64-bit)
 - Windows XP SP2
 - Windows Server 2003 SP1
 - Windows Vista
 - Windows 7
 - Windows 8
 - Windows 10

*Please note that 64-bit builds of Firefox are only supported on Windows 7 and higher.*

### Recommended Hardware
-  Pentium 4 or newer processor that supports SSE2
-  512MB of RAM
-  200MB of hard drive space

---

## Mac

### Operating Systems
- Mac OS X 10.6
- Mac OS X 10.7
- Mac OS X 10.8
- Mac OS X 10.9
- Mac OS X 10.10
- Mac OS X 10.11

### Recommended Hardware
- Macintosh computer with an Intel x86 processor
- 512 MB of RAM
- 200 MB hard drive space

---

## GNU/Linux

### Software Requirements

*Please note that GNU/Linux distributors may provide packages for your distribution which have different requirements.*

- Firefox will not run at all without the following libraries or packages:
    - GTK+ 3.4 or higher
    - GLib 2.22 or higher
    - Pango 1.14 or higher
    - X.Org 1.0 or higher (1.7 or higher is recommended)
    - libstdc++ 4.3 or higher
- For optimal functionality, we recommend the following libraries or packages:
    - NetworkManager 0.7 or higher
    - DBus 1.0 or higher
    - HAL 0.5.8 or higher
    - GNOME 2.16 or higher
